product_name: Gear Aid Tent Sure Polyurethane Sealant - 4 oz.
long_description: Make your gear waterproof again with Tent Sure polyurethane coating for tents and outdoor fabrics. This high-performance formula makes it easy to coat worn areas for longer life and water resistance.
short_description: Make your gear waterproof again with Tent Sure polyurethane coating for tents and outdoor fabrics. This high-performance formula makes it easy to coat worn areas for longer life and water resistance.
